Board.name: gnumch-inequality
Board.author: Joe Neeman (spuzzzzzzz@gmail.com)
Board.title: Inequality Number Munchers
Board.description: Guide the Number Muncher to the all the expressions that do not equal the number at the top of the screen.
Board.goal: Practice addition, subtraction, multiplication and division.
Board.manual: Use the arrow keys to navigate around the board and to avoid the Troggles. Press the spacebar to eat a number.
